name: Willy Crash Mini
summary: Experience the same gameplay of the original Willy Crash, just with a smaller cabinet and a 32″ screen. Willy Crash “Mini” is more than one-and-a-half feet narrower, 10 inches shallower, and almost one foot shorter than the original version. The software and even the plunger are the same; maintaining the same player experience but allowing it to fit into even more locations!
